14098.「芸で得られる よろこびなんか まやかしだぜ。\n 覚えとけ。芸は なんの役にも:
The pleasure you get from tricks is just a
trick. Remember that. Art is useless for
anything.

14099.「……へへ 誰かと思ったら <cs_pchero>か。\n 会いたかったぜ とー:
...hehe, look who it is, <cs_pchero>. I've
missed you, man...very much.

14100.「ポルファンの元で 修行してるってことは\n お前も ご立派な教えに共感してんだ:
I'm assuming that by training under Polfan,
you share his admirable teachings?

14101.「芸は 人を救えるって アレだよ。: It's said that art is able to save people.

14102.「……ハンッ クソが！ イライラさせやがる！\n どいつもこいつも甘ちゃんで ヘ:
...Hanck, you son of a bitch! You're driving
me crazy! They're all so naive. They're
disgusting!

14103.「オレは 芸の無力さに絶望し\n 闇芸人ルルルリーチ様に 尽くすと決めたのだ！:
I despair of my inability to perform, and have
decided to devote myself to Relulu.

14104.「いくぞ 弟弟子 <cs_pchero>よ！\n 本当に芸で人を救えるのなら\n:
Let's go, <cs_pchero>! If you can really
save people with your art, prove it in front
of me!

14105.「……ククク。なかなか やるな。\n だが それでは オレは止められんぞ。:
Kukuku. You're quite good. But that won't stop
me.

14106.悪魔道化師ゲイザーの身体のキズが\n見る見るうちに ふさがっていく。:
The wounds on Demon Clown Gazer's body are
rapidly closing up.

14107.「オレは 旅芸人を抹殺するため\n 何度 ケガを負っても 復活する身体を\n ル:
I was given a body by Lulu Leach-sama that can
revive itself no matter how many times it is
injured in order to eliminate minstrels.

14108.「弟弟子よ。お前の芸が いつわりでないのなら\n 芸で人を救えるというのなら ポ:
My apprentice. If your tricks are not a lie,
if you can save people with your tricks, then
do as Polfan told you and let me make a Bonk!

14109.「……芸で 人なんか救えねえ。 \n それがわかるまで 何百回でも 何千回でも\:
You can't save people with tricks. Until you understand that, I will crush you over and over again, no matter how many hundreds or
thousands of times!

14111.「ポルファンの言葉が いつわりでないのなら\n このオレを 止めてみせろ！:
If Polfan's words are not a lie, then let me
stop you!

14112.「……やるじゃねえか。弟弟子よ。\n お前の芸 確かに見せてもらったぜ。:
...You're good. My apprentice. Your tricks,
I've certainly seen them.

14114.「ひさしぶりに 人間のころの笑いを思いだした。\n ははっ なかなか 面白かった:
For the first time in a while, I remembered
laughing when I was human. Haha, that was
pretty funny...

14115.「あ～あ せっかく キミの中にあった\n 芸を憎む心を 利用してあげたのに。\n:
I took advantage of the hatred for art that
you had inside of you. You lost so easily.

14116.「ルルルリーチ様は 人間のわりに\n 邪悪なオーラを持っていた キミを気に入って:
Master Lulu Leach had an evil aura for a
human, but he liked you so much that he turned
you into a monster.

14117.「もう 用済みだねぇ。\n だいぶ 旅芸人を殺してくれたみたいだし\n そろそろ:
You've done your job. It looks like you've
killed enough minstrels, so it's time for you
to die.

14118.「そ～れ！ 燃えちゃえ～♪\n ３連続 メラゾーマ～♪:
There you go! Let's burn~♪ Three Kafrizz in a
row~♪

14121.「うっひょ～ これは死んだね～♪\n 見てるだけで熱そう♪ 痛そう♪:
Woo hoo~ this is dead.......looks hot just
looking at it......ouch.......

14124.「み みせてくれ。\n さい…ごに お前…の芸を…。:
Let me see. Before... you... do... your...
tricks.

14128.「はは……。そう…いえば\n 母の…死に顔は おだやか…だった。:
Well... come to think of it, my mother's face
was peaceful when she died.

14129.「……きっと 母…も\n 師匠の芸を見て……こんな風に\n 安心して…旅立ったん:
I am sure that my mother...seeing her master's
art...must have felt at ease...like
this...when she left....

14130.「……ははっ まい…ったな。\n これが 芸は…人を救うということか。:
I'll take that. So this is how a trick... is
to save people.

14131.「師匠……。オレが まち…がってたよ。\n あな…たは 確かに 芸で…人を……\:
Master I was wrong. You... have indeed...
saved... people... with... your... tricks.
